message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,250,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a counter-offer.  While $1,800,000 is a respectable figure, the true value of this product is undeniable.  To move this forward, I propose a price of $2,100,000. I believe this reflects the value while still offering you a significant gain.
I understand that the product has value, but I still think $1,800,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,950,000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
